website_summaries.verdict: Steel H-frame construction ensures longevity and durability from this sturdy hydraulic shop press.
pros: Uses a high quality of paint to resist rust
It's also easy to clean grease and oil from the surface of the paint
H-frame design with flat legs ensures stability
Quality of the piston and cylinder ram construction resists skiving
cons: Offers a good value, but it's not really made for consistent, heavy-duty work

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Used it to press out wheel studs and pressed in. Couldnt push out 17 year old wheel bearing out of the knuckle. Its not the press issue, the outer race bearing is just seized.
customer_reviews.author: N355

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable quality for the price, which is to say not great.
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty much what you'd expect for the price, which is not much. it might be good for the occasional need, but it's not well-constructed, it's kind of wiggly and imprecise. And really not good for any kind of precision work. But I didn't expect much more for the price.
customer_reviews.author: KC Jones

customer_reviews.title: this is pretty worthless
customer_reviews.text: the plates they give aren't the right size to do anything, when trying to press out a hub the frame bowed apart and it dropped the middle bolster. the space in the middle bolster isn't big enough for a hub to fit through so you need to build up something to have room for the hub to be pressed out, which is the main problem. there has to be space below the object being pressed out so it can move. I feel I've wasted my money for sure.
customer_reviews.author: david hewerdine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this two press in bushings for a 4x4 project. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: William C.

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Definitely should have read the specs and not just reviews before purchasing. This thing is child size. I’ll either throw together a base for it or work on my damn knees while using it... If you are 6 FT or taller don’t buy this press.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: I use it for pressing bearings and rebuilding mower spindles on my woods mower. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: It worked.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to do a wheel bearing on a 2000 Subaru Outback, it got the job done. 4 stars because it could be designed better but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: jack scagnetti

customer_reviews.title: Happy to have it
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Well built product. I used it to press hubs together on my disc and made the job easy. Well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Leger

customer_reviews.title: The company don't sell any of the parts separately
customer_reviews.text: Used for the first time and started to bend but got job done also had to buy the springs separately and the arbor plates due to box was opened at one end
customer_reviews.author: David Clapper

customer_reviews.title: It builds up more than enough pressure for use
customer_reviews.text: This product is more than useful for many things and durable
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: It’s not worth ordering if you live by a harbor freight
customer_reviews.text: Over priced harbor freight thought it would be a little better quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: Brad David lininger

customer_reviews.title: best press for the money
customer_reviews.text: very solid piece. best press for the money. only 'complaint' is hydraulic pump is not adjustable for angle or side. it just sticks out on right side.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Its short but otherwise a decent unit
customer_reviews.text: This thing is too short to be a free standing unit and too tall to put on a bench. Dont get me wrong its great that there are tools for those that are vertically challenge but I am not one with that issue.
customer_reviews.author: StophinHousen

product_meta.title: Strongway 12-Ton Hydraulic Shop Press
product_meta.description: This 12-Ton Capacity Strongway Hydraulic Shop Press is great for straightening, stamping, bending and pressing any component that is hard to handle. Polished inner cylinder walls extend the life of the hydraulic seals to minimize abrasion and wear, while the cylinder ram and pistons are also polished and chromed, guided by high performance seals, wear rings and dust seals. Adjustable lower bolster. Some assembly required. Tested for reliability and safety to meet ASME ASP 2010 standards. Winch Included No, Dimensions L x W x H in. 20 7/8 x 19 11/16 x 48 7/16, Inside Bed Dimensions L x W in. 16 5/16 x 3 1/8, Working Range in. 0-24, Bed Opening in. 3 1/8, Stroke Length in. 6 7/8, Continuous Force Tons 12. Heavy-duty H-frame constructed of high-grade steel and built to exacting standards for quality and durability Lead-free paint finish is applied after a thorough chemical wash to ensure a long-lasting finish and to help prevent rust Paint is oil, grease and dirt-resistant for easy cleanup High quality large diameter hydraulic steel cylinder unit results in lower oil pressure needed to raise the load, helping to reduce wear and extend service life Piston-ram is treated and polished to resist skiving Piston-ram utilizes a Y-Style polyurethane sealing ring with backup ring, preventing load from falling slowly or bypassing oil drift Hydraulic pump is constructed of QT450 Nodular Iron which has a higher strength than other types of iron resulting in greater durability Hydraulics are powered with a high quality oil, which offers better corrosion resistance and high/low temperature flexibility, allowing the unit to operate at temperatures between 40 degrees F and 105 degrees F Extra-long handle included for easy pumping force Built in ISO certified facilities and engineered using the same systems as Aerospace Technologies and the Automotive OEM sector Meets strict and crucial ASME PALD-2010 safety requirements
feature_bullets: Heavy-duty H-frame constructed of high-grade steel and built to exacting standards for quality and durability
Lead-free paint finish is applied after a thorough chemical wash to ensure a long-lasting finish and to help prevent rust
Paint is oil, grease and dirt-resistant for easy cleanup
High quality large diameter hydraulic steel cylinder unit results in lower oil pressure needed to raise the load, helping to reduce wear and extend service life
Piston-ram is treated and polished to resist skiving

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars32 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
